features: All Sensitive Skin Types - Feel great with our facial toner for sensitive skin that compliments aging, dry, oily or acne skin issues as a face toner men & women both love. Feel refreshed as our spray toner for sensitive skin gently moisturizes your skin

Proactive Pore Reducer - Help purify & penetrate pores with facial toner Witch Hazel extract in our face toner for acne prone skin. An acne toner pore shrinker for face is your perfect skin prep pore tightening product to remove pore-clogging impurities

Anti-Aging Antioxidants - Your facial toner for aging skin seals in hydration with an Aloe vera extract delivering a hydrating toner for face with a youthful glow. Help even out skin tone with skin care toner that works to help your makeup apply smoother

Plant-Powered Ingredients - Our Vitamin C toner spray is a vegan formula crafted in India infused with lemon & orange essential oils, Aloe Vera extract & Witch Hazel alcohol free. We never include harsh parabens, sulfates, mineral oils or silicones

WOW Skin Science Promise - At WOW Skin Science we stand by our products and offer a full refund warranty if you experience any issues with your WOW Skin Science product. Contact us through the Amazon messaging system and we will be happy to assist you

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ALOE VERA EXTRACT Has cooling properties and is anti-inflammatory that remedies sunburn and irritation. It is rich in antioxidants and minerals that boost the restorative process. WITCH HAZEL EXTRACT Reduces redness and irritation while refining the skin. LEMON AND ORANGE ESSENTIAL OILS Detox and balance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mantiene mi piel humectada
reviews.reviewText: Amo este producto ayuda muchísimo a mantener el maquillaje como si lo acabo de poner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite toner. It’s so fresh smelling and easy to use. I went to buy it again, but it was sold out. I’m hoping it’s restocked soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I used this along with the face wash and think it’s worth the money. Would try again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a good spray on toner. This one goes in light, smells lovely citrusy, and leaves skin feeling moisturized and healthy. I’ve added to my subscribe and save as I’ll be using this one for a long time. Not going to get those expensive ones from the malls and department stores anymore as it’s not any better for the price you pay. C

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars smells like ivory soap
reviews.reviewText: beware, this toner does not smell like citrus fruits, nor does it smell like witch hazel. it smells like ivory bar soap-with a hint of citrus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: At first I was skeptical because I've never seen a tomer in mist form let alone it containing scented product. Honestly, I'm surprised! It's left my face feeling more supple and fresh than any other toner I've ever used. Also there is no drying affect afterwards. The smell is so refreshing. Makes my face feel like it's been kissed by the sun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this makes my skin look and feel. I've always received compliments on my skin, but it's definitely increased since I've been using this.My makeup looks better. I have very oily skin, but I'm experiencing very little oily breakthrough during the day. It's well into the afternoon before I have to de-shine my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Refreshing Way to Finish Your Skin Care Regimen For The Day
reviews.reviewText: The Wow Skin Science Vitamin C Skin Mist Toner is a refreshing way to finish your skincare regimen for the day. Simply wash your face as you normally do and then spray the product several inches away from your face. Once the product was on my face it took a few seconds to quickly absorb into my skin. There is an uplifting and pleasant scent of citrus from a combination of lemon and orange essential oils. Surprisingly, there is a faint scent of lime even though lime is not one of the listed ingredients and is pictured on the product packaging. The mist is lightweight and once absorbed into the skin, I noticed that there was no residue remaining from the toner. After each use, I found my skin felt immediately refreshed and hydrated while soft to the touch. During this time, I have also noticed that my skin looks brighter. I was happy to find that this toner does not have a stinging initial feel like other toners I have previously used. The ingredients used include purified water, glycerin, witch hazel extract, aloe vera extract, and benzyl alcohol. The manufacturer notes that this product has no parabens, silicones, mineral oil, or sulfates, and is suitable for all skin types. This product is cruelty-free, 100% vegan, gluten-free, and formulated in the USA but is made in India. The Wow Skin Science Vitamin C Skin Mist Toner refreshes and hydrates your skin with a light mist incorporating the happy scent of orange and lemon. It's a good quality toner that's worth trying.
